name: Lever-Crystal_Peak_Spike_Grub
logic: ORIG | ((Mines_03[bot1] | Mines_03[right1]) + BLUEMOTH + (((CRYSTALMASTER | LEFTDASH | AIRSTALL) + SPIKETUNNELS) | Lever-Crystal_Peak_Spike_Grub)) | (Mines_03[bot1] + ANTIGRAV + (PRECISEMOVEMENT | Longnail | Mark_of_Pride) + SPIKETUNNELS) | (Mines_03[right1] + ANTIGRAV + SPIKETUNNELS)
